title: Subscript
desc: A light-weight JavaScript parser and interpreter written in JavaScript; Subscript provides a completely-bendable JavaScript runtime for ambitious usecases.

features.title: Small! Fast!
features.desc: Try a focused implementation of just everyday JavaScript that fits anywhere.

features.title: Transformable AST
features.desc: Parse your JavaScript code into an AST, and back again into code! Transform in-between.

features.title: A Pseudo Runtime!
features.desc: Fully execute an AST with just any object as its scope! Ditch the native eval() function!

features.title: Runtime Traps and Hooks
features.desc: Follow every operation with Proxy-traps'ish callbacks and runtime hooks.
